Package assembler

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    Assembler
    Assembler class assembles provided source file and outputs machine code
    LexicalScanner
    LexicalScanner scans each line that is supposed to be parsed and converted to machine language by assembler and throws exceptions if unsupported code was provided
    Main  
    Mnemonic
    Mnemonic stores information about each supported mnemonic
    Opcode
    Opcode keeps information about each opcode
    Parser
    Parser parses provided line and converts to machine code using regex and most of the classes in package assembler
    SymbolTable
    SymbolTable stores information about all the found labels, keeps their addresses and values
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    DirectiveTable
    DirectiveTable keeps track of supported directives
    LabelTable
    Label Table keeps track of known labels
    OpcodeTable
    OpcodeTable stores all the supported Mnemonics with their opcodes and instruction types
    PatternTable
    PatternTable stores all the regular expression used to scan and parse provided file
